subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Outfielder J.D. Drew doesn’t have a contract with the Red Sox. The club and Drew’s agent, Scott Boras, have taken longer to complete a contract than they took negotiating its terms.
snippet: Outfielder J.D. Drew doesn’t have a contract with the Red Sox. The club and Drew’s agent, Scott Boras, have taken longer to complete a contract than they took negotiating its terms.
